Key Match Events: Garry Rodrigues scored a late goal to hand Cape Verde a 2-1 victory over Ghana
Jamiro Monteiro scored the opening goal for Cape Verde on 17 minutes
Alexander Djiku scored the equalizer for Ghana on 57 minutes
Post-Match Reflections: Chris Hughton will need to revisit the drawing board after Ghana's shock defeat by Cape Verde
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ghana controlled much of the possession for the first half but found it hard to break down Cape Verde
Others: Both teams are yet to win in the tournament as Egypt drew 2-2 with Mozambique earlier in the day
